description:
Unlocks the Open Sky Uniform Set in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions' Versus and Online Versus mode matches.

Includes the following:
- Open Sky Uniform
- Open Sky Ball
- Open Sky Cleats
Customise even more your team and matches with these news items!

Defy The Laws of Football
Become Legend
name: Captain Tsubasa: RoNC Open Sky Uniform Set
